title: Find your IRL friends and earn a 4-win IP boost

replies.body: Link has been updated. Sorry about that! http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/find-your-irl-friends-league-now
I did it, but i have no friends, will i still get the rewards?
Yeah you just need the accounts linked, you're pretty much solid.
sweet, i need some more IP for runes and im saving for ekko
where can i do this ? i click the link and it doesn't work

Link has been updated. You can check it out here http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/find-your-irl-friends-league-now The feature can be accessed by clicking on Find Friends in game.
It's not until June the 1st
The link says flip the switch 'before then'
Go to add friends in game, and you can link it there
Already added all my friends D: Do I still get the boost?
You just need to have your accounts linked for the whole 24 hours of June 1, so yes
750/750 fully stacked tear
How do we link
ok

I have 190k IP

Don't think i need a boost

hi
{{champion:84}} {{item:3113}} {{summoner:2}}
wut

{{champion:58}} EATS{{champion:105}} FOR DINNER
I've connected my fb but it can't find anyone -.- I have tonnes of people added  and it can't find one? Seems legit. Just want my boost -.-
The day after I deactivated my Facebook as well. The horror!
DAT BROKEN LINK THO
Guys click on FIND FRIENDS in your game client (where Add Friends used to be) then sign in via facebook.
Is there another link?{{summoner:4}}
hi

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/find-your-irl-friends-league

I did this like 3 weeks ago... Will I still get the boost?

What is Facebook i only have Twitter sorry but i just dont like bitching about people online and updating my status 24/7
but what if you've already friended people from facebook before this date? do you still get ip
But what if i don't have any friends? :'(
Leave a comment{{summoner:30}}
my build
guys, it doesn't matter if you haven't added anyone from facebook (or if you have no friends at all) you just have to have your fb and LoL accounts linked for the day, then you get the boost. easy.
{{champion:103}}

what if i dont have a facebook account cuz its a fucking horribly god awful fucking piece of shit site that people use for who the fuck knows what or why ... fuckign sad how every fucking thing is some how connected to facebook these days ... fucking horrible site
Can use tears as lube?

Well you could make an account to use just for this and then forget about its existence for the rest of time, it only takes a few minutes. I don't like that site myself as well and have never actually used it but that hasn't stopped me from using creating throwaway accounts to get freebies such as Tristana and her Riot Girl skin, but hey don't let me stop your blind ignorant hatred for that site prevent you from taking advantage of this opportunity.
Who the hell get's this mad over something so little?
